message: Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's truly one-of-a-kind and I believe it has immense value for you. I'm asking for $1,750,000, which reflects its quality and potential. Let me know your thoughts!

Alice, thank you for the offer. While I see the value in this product, $1,750,000 is above my budget.  I'm prepared to offer $1,400,000.  I believe this price is fair considering my budget and the product's value to me.  Let's see if we can find common ground.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer.  While I understand your budget, $1,400,000 doesn't quite reflect the true worth of this product.  I'm willing to come down to $1,600,000, which I believe is a fair compromise.  Let's see if we can close this deal.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down on the price.  $1,600,000 is still a bit high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $1,550,000.  This is the highest I can go while staying within my budget.  Let's see if we can finalize this deal.
